title: The 23 Best Work Pants For Women: Work Hard, Dress Smarter
description: If you're in the mood for some retail therapy that’s both guilt-free and year-round practical, we’ve got your office wardrobe covered. Work pants often get a bad rap, but we're here to dispel the myth that they have to be stiff, frumpy, or the first thing you ditch when you get home. Our curated list of the best work pants for women includes everything from classic wide-leg trousers to on-point boot cuts, flares, and straight-leg silhouettes.Ahead, discover stylish and versatile options in every cut, color, size, length, and price point — including relaxed styles for casual Fridays and elevated picks perfect for post-work dinners. So grab your favorite work bag, step into comfortable work shoes, and prepare to shimmy into your favorite new pants to tackle your day in style.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can't-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.Banana Republic Straight Everywhere Ponte Ankle PantEvery closet needs a no-fuss ponte pant, and this classic Banana Republic style fits the bill. Soft, slightly stretchy, and straight-cut it’s a workwear hero piece —  available in petite and tall sizes, too. Banana Republic Straight Everywhere Ponte Ankle Pant, $, available at Banana RepublicFavorite Daughter The Favorite Pant Pleat PantsThese ultra-high-waisted trousers create the illusion of mile-long legs — and a boost of confidence to match. From the soft pleats to the fluid legs, these are sure to have you strutting through the office with extra pep.Favorite Daughter The Favorite Pant Pleat Pants, $, available at NordstromOld Navy High-Waisted Pull-On Pixie Wide-Leg PantsA tried-and-true wardrobe staple, these classic Old Navy pants are a practical go-to you’ll reach for on repeat. From the effortless pull-on waistband and wide-leg silhouette to the praises of over 3.3K shoppers, these under-$50 pants are a no-brainer (possibly worth buying in multiples). Old Navy High-Waisted Pull-On Pixie Wide-Leg Pants, $, available at Old NavyVuori Meta Wideleg Trouser PantsIn true Vuori fashion, these best-selling wide-leg pants are stylish but comfortable as heck. Crafted from a breathable four-way stretch fabric with an elastic waistband, they’re so comfy you’ll forget to change out of them after work.Vuori Meta Wideleg Trouser Pants, $, available at VuoriReformation Mason PantReformation's sleek, lightweight woven trousers come in several neutral, work-ready neutrals (and a few bold hues), but this stripped pattern serves up corporatecore vibes in the best way possible. Reformation Mason Pant, $, available at ReformationQuince Ultra-Stretch Ponte Straight Leg PantsWith over 6.8K rave reviews, Quince's ponte pants combine the comfort of yoga pants with a work-ready sensibility. Available in four inseam lengths, they’re designed to fit you perfectly. Quince Ultra-Stretch Ponte Straight Leg Pants, $, available at QuinceMadewell The Harlow Wide-Leg Pant in Drapey TwillThese editor-approved Madewell pants are essential for wide-leg trouser fans. The lightweight twill style comes in standard, plus, petite, tall, and curvy sizes — the Harlow design is also available in other fabrics, including denim.Madewell The Harlow Wide-Leg Pant in Drapey Twill, $, available at MadewellJ.Crew Delaney Kickout Sweater-PantTurn heads in trending red pull-on pants with an ever-so-slight crop and flare fit. Prefer something more versatile? They’re offered in muted colorways that work for any dress code.  J.Crew Delaney Kickout Sweater-Pant, $, available at J.CrewWe The Free Good Sport TrousersFor laidback office dress codes, these sporty cotton Free People pants are a winner. The tie-up, boxer-style waistband adds a unique touch to the classic silhouette and can be easily concealed under an oversized sweater or button-down shirt.We The Free Good Sport Trousers, $, available at Free PeopleLululemon Stretch Knit Straight-Leg Pull-On PantLululemon’s best-selling activewear is the brand’s calling card, but their elevated styles deserve your attention, too. Case in point: the much-loved Softstreme Pintuck Pant and newer Stretch Knit Straight-Leg Pant, which both feature stretchy fabric, a comfy pull-on waist, and polished pleats. Lululemon Stretch Knit Straight-Leg Pull-On Pant, $, available at LululemonMaeve The Colette Cropped Wide-Leg PantsWith nearly 3K reviews and a 4.6-star rating on Anthropologie, Maeve’s Colette pants are a surefire office favorite. Available in multiple colors, inseam lengths, plus sizes, and adaptive-friendly options, they’re as versatile as they are stylish. You can also explore other best-selling Colette styles to find your perfect match.Maeve The Colette Cropped Wide-Leg Pants, $, available at AnthropologieGood American Scuba Boss Straight Trouser Step aside — this trouser means business. The figure-hugging bootcut silhouette is crafted from a double-knit stretch fabric that cinches the waist, delivering all-day comfort and confidence.Good American Scuba Boss Straight Trouser, $, available at Good AmericanAbercrombie & Fitch Curve Love Sloane Tailored Wide Leg PantTired of trousers that gap in the back? Look to Abercrombie’s editor-approved Curve Love pants, designed to cinch your waist perfectly. With over 2.1K glowing reviews — and nearly 2K for the straight-size version — their popularity and versatility speak for themselves.Abercrombie & Fitch Curve Love Sloane Tailored Wide Leg Pant, $, available at Abercrombie & FitchAlo Long High-Waist Pursuit Trouser Tall gals rejoice —  Alo’s 33-inch-inseam pants are a bestseller waiting to join your closet. With a relaxed fit that nails the cool-girl vibe, they’re a must-have. And you better believe the regular length boasts stellar reviews, too.Alo Long High-Waist Pursuit Trouser, $, available at AloEloquii Plus Size The Ultimate Stretch Slim Leg PantEloquii’s plus-size workwear is a standout, and these best-selling pants top our professional wardrobe checklist. Choose between a range of classic and bold colorways and inseam lengths for the perfect fit.   Eloquii The Ultimate Stretch Slim Leg Pant, $, available at EloquiiAritzia The Effortless PantLiving up to its name, the Aritzia Effortless Pant makes any office ‘fit look and feel effortlessly polished. Available in this mocha brown hue — or over 20 other shades —  it comes in four lengths and a wide size range, making your quest for the perfect pair truly effortless.Aritzia The Effortless Pant, $, available at AritziaHalara High Waisted Shirred Straight Leg Work PantsFinding pants that fit a smaller waist can be tricky, but Halara solves the issue with a stretchy back waistband hidden in a classic suit pant design. Add a statement belt to conceal it, and they’ll look custom-tailored. Bonus: they come in a wide range of colors, sizes, and inseam lengths.Halara High Waisted Shirred Straight Leg Work Pants, $, available at HalaraEverlane The Dream PantWith pintuck detailing and an elastic waistband, these pants are perfect for casual work settings. Everlane’s best-seller has racked up over 870 glowing reviews and comes in several classic colorways  — but act fast before they sell out.Everlane The Dream Pant, $, available at EverlaneUniqlo Pleated Wide Pant These relaxed-fit pants give ‘80s power leg vibes — a major 2025 fashion trend. Plus, you can have them tailored to your preferred inseam before they even arrive —  at no extra cost! Uniqlo Pleated Wide Pants, $, available at UniqloAlex Mill Sloane PantA fan-favorite of many Refinery29 editors, Alex Mill nails the art of well-made wardrobe essentials. The Sloan chino is a timeless choice that'll carry you through the workweek — and beyond. Alex Mill Sloane Pant, $, available at Alex MillAnn Taylor The Belted Pleated Wide-Leg PantBelted trousers mean one less thing to think about during those early work mornings. These offer put-together style in seconds flat, making them a must — especially while the on-sale style is still in stock.Ann Taylor The Belted Pleated Wide-Leg Pant, $, available at Ann TaylorSpanx PerfectFit Ponte Flare PantSpanx isn’t just about shapewear — the brand’s everyday attire shines, too, like these flared pants with a 4-star rating from over 3.5K shoppers. Made with light-compression SpanxSmooth ponte fabric, they’re a fan favorite and come in petite, tall, and plus sizes as a sartorial cherry on top.SPANX PerfectFit Ponte Flare Pant, $, available at SPANXDickies Flex Slim Fit Bootcut PantsDickies, the heritage workwear brand, delivers a bootcut pant that works as hard as you do. These top-rated trousers combine a professional look with durable, stretchy twill fabric that moves with you — no gaping, no tearing, no problem.Dickies Flex Slim Fit Bootcut Pants, $, available at DickiesAlo Yoga High-Waist Pursuit Trouser Lightweight and airy, Alo Yoga's high-waisted pants are comfy with an elastic back, belt loops, and pleats for a look that says "business in the front, (couch) party in the back." Shop Alo YogaAlo Yoga High-Waist Pursuit Trouser, $, available at Alo YogaBanana Republic Tencel Linen Wide-Leg PantWe love linen wide-leg pants, and this summer we are living for these Banana Republic ones made with a blend of linen and sustainable tencel lyocell to keep us feeling cool. The beige color is great but the pants are also offered in a darling baby pink to add softness to your office outfit.Shop Banana RepublicBanana Republic Tencel Linen Wide-Leg Pant, $, available at Banana RepublicLilySilk Comfort Fit Silk Cigarette PantsLilySilk's Comfort Fit Silk Cigarette Pants are made of silk charmeuse, a luxe responsible fabric that has a pearl-like luster that is breathable, hypoallergenic, comfortable, and drapes well on the body. These classic cigarette pants are ultra elegant and will serve at any office you wear them to.Shop LilySilkLilySilk Comfort Fit Silk Cigarette Pants, $, available at LilySilkFree People In My Feelings Slim Crop PantsThe In My Feelings Slim Crop Pants are another pair of pants fit for a more casual office that can be dressed up or down depending on your office's dress code. We love the colorful plaid to add some fun to the corporate world. These vintage-inspired pants are mid-rise and have an elastic waistband for chic comfort all day from 9-5 (or longer for happy hour!). Shop Free PeopleFree People In My Feelings Slim Crop Pants, $, available at Free PeopleMadewell The Harlow Wide-Leg PantMadewell's Harlow pants are a best-seller for multiple reasons. The flattering cut comes in a drapey, comfortable material, and they're available in many colors in standard, petite, tall, and plus sizes.Shop MadewellMadewell The Harlow Wide-Leg Pant, $, available at MadewellVuori Meta Wideleg PantIn true Vuori fashion, the Meta Wideleg pants are stylish but still comfortable as heck. Made of the breathable Vuori VersaLife fabric with four-way stretch and an elastic waistband, you'll never want to take these pants off. Shop VuoriVuori Meta Wideleg Pant, $, available at VuoriAnn Taylor The Petite Single Pleated Linen Wide-Leg PantSummer heat can be brutal, and breathable fabrics work just as well for the office as they do your subway commute. This gorgeous lilac linen wide-leg pant is a perfect example of adding color and comfort to a summer work wardrobe while staying professional.Shop Ann TaylorAnn Taylor The Petite Single Pleated Linen Wide Leg Pant, $, available at Ann TaylorMaeve The Colette Cropped Wide-Leg PantsNot all work pants have to be neutral colors, we love these printed pants from Maeve for a more casual office. This version of the reader-favorite Colette pant is a comfy wide-leg available in six patterns with multiple pockets for maximum storage space.Shop AnthropologieMaeve The Colette Cropped Wide-Leg Pants, $, available at AnthropologieAritzia The Effortless PantTrue to its name, the Aritzia Effortless Pant is indeed a way to make your office fit look effortlessly polished. The cool ashen color (or one of the other 15+ colors) is available in four different lengths and a multitude of fabrics and sizes so once you find your size, your options are endless. Shop AritziaAritzia The Effortless Pant, $, available at AritziaFavorite Daughter The Favorite Pant Pleat PantsUltra-high-waisted trousers give legs an elongated look that'll have you feeling super confident.Shop Favorite Daughter At NordstromFavorite Daughter The Favorite Pant Pleat Pants, $, available at NordstromHalara High Waisted Straight Leg Work Suit PantsFinding pants that fit a smaller waist can be difficult. Halara's Straight Leg Work Suit Pants work to address that issue with a pant that has all the qualities of traditional suit pants but a stretchy waistband in the back. You can cover the stretchy part with a chic belt and it's like the pants were tailored for your body! We love that so many colors and sizes are offered for different body types and styles.Shop HalaraHalara High Waisted Straight Leg Work Suit Pants, $, available at HalaraDickies Flex Slim-Fit Bootcut PantsFrom heritage workwear brand Dickies is a flattering pant that will put in the work so you don't have to. The Flex Slim-Fit Bootcut pant looks professional but it's also durable, and made of breathable and stretchy twill fabric that will keep you comfy and allow you to bend or twist without any worry of gaping or tearing. Shop DickiesDickies FLEX Slim Fit Bootcut Pants, $, available at DickiesReformation Mason PantFind Reformation's sleek, lightweight woven trousers in several neutral, work-appropriate colorways and this stylish stripe pattern that you can style with any blouse. Shop ReformationReformation Mason Pant, $, available at ReformationSummersalt The Softest French Terry Tie-Waist PantWith a unique belted tie waist, the French Terry Tie-Waist Pant is a bit more fun and out of the ordinary than standard work bottoms, making them great for dinner and drinks too.Shop SummersaltSummersalt The Softest French Terry Tie-Waist Pant, $, available at SummersaltDickie's Something About Elburg Trousers TEMPLATEThese wide-leg slacks from Free People have a nonchalant menswear vibe with subtle eye-catching pleat details and an adjustable cinch band at the back. Shop Dickie'sFree People Something About Elburg Trousers, $, available at Free PeopleGood American Scuba Bootcut Pants Move aside, this look isn't here to play. Look chic and exude confidence in a figure-hugging bootcut pant. The trousers are crafted from a double-knit stretch fabric for extra comfort that cinches at the waist. Shop Good AmericanGood American Scuba Bootcut Pants, $, available at Good AmericanEverlane The Dream PantPintuck detailing and an elastic waistband are perfect for more casual work settings. And we're loving this Everlane option, which is available in several classic colorways.Shop EverlaneEverlane The Dream Pant, $, available at EverlaneJ.Crew Sydney Wide-Leg Pant In Bi-Stretch Cotton Blend Cropped for our petite gals, these polished J.Crew pants hit right at the ankle. The bottoms are designed to withstand hours of sitting or moving around. It's slim through the hip and thigh and has a wide-leg look. Shop J.CrewJ.Crew Sydney Wide-Leg Pant In Bi-Stretch Cotton Blend, $, available at J.CrewCotidié Larissa Perfect Length TrousersChoose between three different inseam lengths with these pants. Then go on and wear the comfortable style to work, a date night, or even on a long-haul flight.Shop CotidiéCotidie Larissa Perfect Length Trousers, $, available at CotidieQuince Ultra-Stretch Ponte Straight Leg PantWith over 4.8K positive reviews, Quince's pants are so stretchy and comfy that they feel like yoga pants but look so polished that they're perfect for work. The pants are offered in four different inseam lengths to fit all leg lengths. Shop QuinceQuince Ultra-Stretch Ponte Straight Leg Pant, $, available at QuinceLike what you see?
